title: Coffee & Catch-Up (London)
short: Casual morning coffee to meet peers.
details: Agenda: intros, lightning updates, peer asks. Hosts: NextGen team. Expect 15–25 attendees.

title: IHEEM Congress Meetup
details: Gather near the main entrance; venue move after 18:00. Bring a colleague.

title: Q4 Network Session: Energy & Sustainability
details: Lightning talks from Trusts, panel on decarbonisation pathways, 30-min networking.

title: After Work Drinks (Leeds)
short: Relaxed drinks to close the year.
details: First round covered for first 20 RSVPs. Venue TBC.
